full_title: Dancing In The Flames by The Weeknd
title: Dancing In The Flames

description.plain:
“Dancing In The Flames” is the lead single for Toronto musician Abel Tesfaye’s sixth studio album, and expected final release under the stage name “The Weeknd”, Hurry Up Tomorrow. The song’s existence, as well as its production credits, were revealed on August 30, 2024 through being uploaded on the ASCAP database.

“Dancing in the Flames” encapsulates the idea of a passionate love that endures through risks and chaos. The repeated imagery of driving, crashing, and flames symbolizes the unpredictable and often dangerous path of a deep romantic connection. The lyrics convey a sense of urgency, beauty amidst peril, and a transcendent love that persists despite the potential for pain and loss.

The song was first previewed on September 7, 2024, alongside other songs from Hurry Up Tomorrow, during Tesfaye’s one-night-only performance in Sao Paulo, Brazil. After the performance, the song’s title was further evidenced by the surfacing of the performance’s internal setlist.

On September 9, 2024, the song’s music video was announced through  an Apple Event, with the company stating that the video was shot using cameras and video-capturing techniques from their then-unreleased iPhone 16 Pro. Later that day, Tesfaye officially announced the song’s title, cover, and release date of September 13, 2024.

(Yeah)

Traffic dies while we are racin' home
Melted lights cover the open road
I hope we make it 'cause I've been chasin'
Another odyssey, oh

I can't wait to see your face
Crash when we're switchin' lanes
My love's beyond the pain
But if I miss the brake
We're dancin' in the flames
It's indescribable

Ooh, yeah

"The world can't heal," they say on the radio (Oh, no)
So grab the wheel, want you to be in control
We're dodgin' headlights, and you say, "Hold tight"
Another odyssey, oh (Hey)

I can't wait to see your face
Crash when we're switchin' lanes
My love's beyond the pain
But if I miss the brake
We're dancin' in the flames
It's indescribable

Ooh (Indescribable), oh
Ooh

Everything's faded, we barely made it
The fire's ragin' but you're still beautiful
And it's amazin' 'cause I can taste it
Our final odyssey, oh

I can't (I can't) wait to see your face (Can't wait to see, ha)
Crash when we're switchin' lanes
My love's beyond the pain (Hey)
But if I miss the brake
We're dancin' in the flames (Dancin' in the flames)
So just have faith (Just have faith in me)
We'll never be the same (We'll never be, never be)
It's indescribable

Ooh (Indescribable), oh, hey
Ooh (Indescribable)
